Text: Ok so by the time you had posted this there were already 3 versions of the same quality of this show up on the pirate bay.  If you want people to support your server cost and whatnot you might want to try giving them something they don't already have from elsewhere.  Here's a hint:  so far as my search revealed no one else has uploaded the HD version of this show on TPB.  I clicked on the VTV version of this file 'cuz it already had 1000+ seeders by the time I got here.  yours has 1 and really, what's the point at this point?  Bring us HD and be clicked upon!  Otherwise you torrents die.
